name: Minor Creation
description: You create a number of simple objects. Each object cannot have more than 2 Presence and appears in your hand or on the ground near you.

name: Reconstruct
description: The target starts to reassemble itself with nearby parts. If there are some parts missing, you can substitute a similar amount of raw material to recreate a simple part. This spell does not need to be maintained, but the reconstruction takes a 1 minute per point of Presence.

name: Create Intensity
description: You create intensities of Heat, Cold, Electricity, or Light.

name: Regeneration
description: The target gains a natural Regeneration final value. If the target's final value is greater than what the spell provides, than the spell has no effect.

name: Basic Modification
description: You change the target's form. The new form's Presence must be no greater than the target's original Presence.

name: Increase Resistance
description: The target gains a power bonus to their Phr, IR, SR, and MR.

name: Royal Shield
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. This barrier possess the Imbued trait.

name: Heal
description: The target recovers Life Points and reduces its degrees of Pain. This spell cannot restore damaged limbs or eliminate Pain.

name: Negate Damage
description: The target gains a Base Damage Negate against the Physical Damage Group. This BDN can be overcome with the Imbued trait.

name: Create Homunculus
description: You create monad creatures. The creature's level is 0 and must follow the rules for monad creatures. Each homunculus created can have different profiles. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creatures are mana elementals with Nornir 5.
No Characteristic or Skill can have a final falue greater than 5.
The creature's size is reduced by 2 and it cannot choose the Uncommon Size feature.
No Intellectual or Creative skill's final value can be greater than your final value.

description: No matter how many creatures this spell creates, they count as a single creature for the purpose of determining the maximum level of other monad creatures.

name: Minor Change
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You change the target's superficial appearance. A target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of minutes have passed equal to their Degree of Failure. The target can have its size increased or decreased by 2 points, but anything it is wearing does not change.

name: Imitate
description: You create a duplicate of the target. The duplicate has the same Presence and retains all the qualities of the original, including supernatural ones.

name: Immunity
description: The target gains immunity to intensities of either Heat, Cold, or Electricity.

name: Reduce Damage
description: You can cast this spell when an attack is declared but before any dice are rolled. The triggering attack suffers a deed penalty to its Base Damage.

name: Physical Control
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You gain active control over the target's physical abilities. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of hours have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.

name: Raise Skill
description: The target gains a number of points to distribute to any trained Secondary Skill as a power bonus.

name: Fuse
description: The targets must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends on both targets.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The targets are fused into a single entity. The nature of the final form depends on the targets. When the spell ends, the targets return to their original form, sharing any damage they took while fused. If the new entity dies or is broken, then both targets die or are broken.

description.name: Case: two creatures
entries: The new creature possess the best abilities, skills, and features of both targets. Any negative features are also applied to the new creature unless the other target has a feature that can cancel it out.

Control of the resulting creature is determined by an Opposed Willpower Check between the targets. The Opposed Willpower Check can be repeated on the End Phase after a number of hours have passed equal to the Degree of Difference. If the DoD is less than 10, then the personality of the loser will still influence the actions of the new creature.

description.name: Case: one creature and one object
entries: The Game Master can grant the new creature features related to the fused object.

description.name: Case: two objects
entries: You and the Game Master can determine what the new object will be able to do, based on the original objects.

name: Create Memories
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You create new memories within the target's mind. The target can repeat the Resistance Check when given reason to doubt the false memories. If the false memories are against the nature of the target, the Resistance Check decreases by 1 each time they make the Resistance Check. For example, a peaceful person given the memory of murdering a friend would find it easier and easier to disbelieve.

name: Recover
description: The target recovers Life Points. You also remove Pain that is caused by natural means, such as hunger or exhaustion. This spell cannot restore damaged limbs.

name: Acquire Power
description: The target gains features whose total XP cost is no greater than the listed amount using a monad template. The features can be purchased as a Nornir 25 creature. The physical form of the target will change as appropriate. For example, if the target gains a natural Flight Value, they would sprout wings.

name: Create Creature
description: You create a monad creature. The creature's level can be no greater than the listed value and must follow the rules for monad creatures. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creature is a natural, beyond the veil, or elemental with Nornir 15.

name: Protective Aura
description: All entities of your choice within the zone gain a power bonus to PhR, IR, SR, and MR Checks. You must be aware of an entity to target it.

name: Spiritual Standstill
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target becomes immutable and cannot become affected by any new mental state and any current mental state remains until the spell ends. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check. The spell only ends when the spell is no longer maintained.

name: Perfect Shield
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. If the barrier is not broken, it regains all its Life Points at the start of the Intention Phase.

name: Vitality
description: The target gains a power bonus to their maximum Life Points and they regain the same number Life Points. When the spell ends, the target's current and maximum Life Points are reduced by the amount gained.
A target with the Rex Damage Role multiplies the bonus by their Rex Multiplier.

name: Complete Creation
description: You create an object whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value or twice your Presence. The object must appear in a location that is logical for it, according to its nature. For example, you could not create a boulder in mid air, but a cloud could appear in the sky.

name: Reinforce Magic
description: You can cast this spell when you cast another spell configuration of the listed degree. The triggering spell configuration has the following benefits:

items: Any SR Check increases the difficulty by 2
Any Base Damage is increased by 50%
Supernatural barrier's gain 50% more Life Points
All other numbers increase by 20%, round down, except for Nornir.

description: You must maintain the triggering spell and this spell. If either spell ends, both spells end.

name: Transmute
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target transforms into a different object with similar Presence. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check. The spell only ends when the spell is no longer maintained.

name: Metamorphism
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target transforms into a different entity with similar Presence. The target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed. If the new form is a creature, the Game Master can grant certain creature features of a natural creature with Nornir 0. If the new form is an object, the target remains alive. The Game Master will determine the nature of an object turned into a creature.

name: Recreate
description: The target regains any Life Points that the they have lost and any lost body part is regenerated. You can choose to only restore or regenerate some of the target.

This spell has three limitations. It is unable to return a spirit to its body. So a creature that has died cannot be revived with this spell. The spell can only return a target to a natural state. So it cannot create an eye or an arm where no existed and cannot restore damage caused by aging. If the entity was damaged by a creature whose Nornir is 15 points higher than yours, the spell has no effect on the target.

name: Create Being
description: You create a monad creature. The creature's level can be no greater than the listed value and must follow the rules for monad creatures. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creature is a natural, beyond the veil, or elemental with Nornir 25.

name: Chimera
description: The target becomes a Beyond the Veil creature with a Nornir 25. The target gains levels and purchase negative creature features to gain additional XP.
All creature features gained as a result of this spell are tied to the target's body. If the target ever loses their body, all effects of the spell disappear.

effect: Up to 10 XP of negative features
Up to 20 XP of negative features
Up to 30 XP of negative features
Up to 40 XP of negative features

name: Zone of Safety
description: All entities within the zone must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check. You are affect by this spell and you cannot select targets, no matter what other powers allow, all entities are affected equally.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this spell for one day.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is unable to harm any entity within the zone. The target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed. The spell does not stop affecting an entity if it leaves the zone, but remember that the spell only prevents harm to other entities within the zone. For example, a target could not break down a door or step on a spider within the zone. Similarly, an arrow that fails the Resistance Check cannot harm anything in the zone.
The one exception is an entity can continue to cook and consume food and drink that has already been harvested or prepared.

name: Maintain Magic
description: A maintained spell configuration gains a special Mana Pool that it can pull from to maintain itself. A spell that requires maintenance each round still requires its caster to take the Maintain Spell action.
You can cast this spell multiple times on the same spell configuration. This gives it even more mana.

name: Provide Soul
description: You create a soul. You can place that soul within the target. When a creature created from a power, such as Create Being, gains a soul, it severs all ties with its caster. The creature is no longer controlled by its caster and does not need to be maintained any more.

Not all souls created by this spell are capable of entering a body. Each soul created has a one percent chance to be rejected or is automatically rejected if the body possess too much Presence. In this case, the soul lingers one minute before moving onto the Veil.

name: Greater Creation
description: You gain a pool of Presence that you can use to create mundane objects as an active action. Any object you create cannot have a Presence greater than the listed value but does not disappear when the spell ends. Once the pool of Presence is used up, the spell ends.

name: Eternal Magic
description: A spell of Level 80 or less that you or another entity are maintaining requires less maintenance. A spell with daily maintenance becomes permanent. A spell with turn maintenance becomes a daily spell.

name: Separate Worlds
description: You create a breach in reality that is capable of separating the world into two parts. The maximum volume that can be separated is listed. This separation cannot be perceived naturally, all visual planes are unable to sense the change. The wall itself can be made to have any appearance, from being invisible to being a large stone wall. Any attempt to see through the wall fails, no matter what power is used.

Any attempt to move through the wall causes the entity to reappear at another point on the wall. This transport is not automatic, instead it occurs little by little as reality changes to steer you away. This failed navigation can be detected with a Zen (44) Notice Check.

You can choose to create passages, either two or one way and requires certain conditions to be meet. Alternatively, a Nornir 25 entity who is aware of the separated worlds and is navigating can make an SR Check to get through. A success also allows the entity to lead others through if they travel as a group. An entity who has failed can repeat the Resistance Check after a day has passed. An entity that has passed must make a new Resistance Check once they leave its border.

name: The Gift of Life
description: You create a new creature. The creature's level can be no greater than the listed value and must follow the rules for monad creatures. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creature is either a natural, spiritual or Beyond the Veil creature.
The creature's Nornir can be any value you choose, but can be no greater than ten points below your Nornir.

description: You can choose if the new creature will be part of the Veil. If you do, it becomes a true part of the world and it will start to appear in an a natural habitat for it, can be summoned, or appear as part of the next Veil -- depending on the creature type.

name: Create
description: You gain a pool of Presence Points that you can use to create anything; continents, oceans, and entire worlds can be created by your hand. Any entity you create cannot have a Presence greater than the listed maximum Presence. Additionally, you can impose new rules upon reality. For example, you can change the fundamental law of gravity or the passage of time. Any creature with a Nornir of less than half your Nornir is affected by the new reality.
